text:
In an age where everyone’s looking for a spoiler, it’s good to know that some people can still keep a secret. After premiering her brand new video for “Look What You Made Me Do,” Taylor Swift gave her backup dancers a present for keeping quiet about their role in the much-anticipated music video.

Swift decided to premiere the video at the MTV VMAs, right after releasing a lyrical video that helped debut the song itself. The video was pretty complex — Swift is pretty much saying goodbye to her old personas and focusing on a rebrand. She already broke a record for having the most views a day after release — 43.2 million views to be exact. And that number is, obviously, still climbing.

As we all know, success on projects like this happen when you’ve got a solid team by your side. Which is why we’re glad that Swift made sure to share her appreciation for those who helped out by sending flowers and a really sweet card.

"Thanks for keeping our secret. 🙂 I'm so proud of it and I hope you will be too." - Taylor sent the #LWYMMDVideo dancers flowers ❤️ pic.twitter.com/x08ea8pGBX — Taylor Swift News (@TSwiftDailyNews) August 29, 2017

The card read, “Thanks for keeping our secret. 🙂 I’m so proud of it and I hope you will be too. Sending my love and gratitude, Taylor.”

This isn’t the first time Swift has sent a bouquet to share her appreciation. She also sent flowers to those who stood by her during her recent trial. The employees at a company called Craftsy let Swift know that they were on her side by creating Post-It note messages on their windows, with motivational phrases like “Free Tay,” and song lyrics like “People throw rocks at things that shine.”

Thank you @taylorswift13! We're so happy our messages brightened your day as much as your flowers brightened ours! 🤗 pic.twitter.com/Yd0QvdBXQh — Craftsy (@beCraftsy) August 15, 2017

We’re all about the sweet gesture. It’s good to know that Swift gives credit where credit’s due.
title: Taylor Swift gave her "Look What You Made Me Do" dancers a special gift for "keeping our secret"

twitter.creator: @KarenEBelz
twitter.title: Taylor Swift gave her “Look What You Made Me Do” dancers a special gift for “keeping our secret”

meta_data.description: It's pretty sweet that Taylor Swift made sure to acknowledge her dancers for keeping her record-breaking video a secret.

og.title: Taylor Swift gave her “Look What You Made Me Do” dancers a special gift for “keeping our secret”
